greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the start of the first arithmetic progression with common difference n of n numbers with the same prime signature.
comment: First column of A087307; main diagonal of A114656.
a(n) > 10^10 for n from 9 to 11. a(12) = 120998. [From _Donovan Johnson_, Oct 24 2009]
example: a(4) = 111 as 111, 115, 119 and 123 all are of the prime signature p*q.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Sep 02 2003
ext: Edited and extended by _David Wasserman_, Jan 08 2006
